name: Applications Arbiter

dialogue.text: You should've learned about applications in class...
And you should know they're not only applied in class!

banter: You thought you could escape the applications?
I'll ensure you never forget the applications!
You can see these applications all over the world!
correct: Put away the AI and try to solve them on your own.
Just because you applied your skills once doesn't make you a hotshot.
I'll have harder problems for you to optimize soon enough!
wrong: Don't try to apply your skills again.
Just like that! Keep falling to my problems!
